## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy — Plain Text)
Start your day with calm focus and gentle momentum.
This 3 hour lofi and synthwave mix is designed to ease you into deep concentration, inspired by early sunrise light, warm analog textures, and smooth retro synth tones. The energy slowly brightens over time, helping you wake up calmly, focus clearly, and work without distraction.
No sudden changes. No vocals. Just smooth, evolving energy for long focus sessions.
All music in this mix is royalty free and safe to use in videos, streams, or background content. Credit is appreciated but not required.
Best for:
- Studying and homework
- Coding and creative work
- Morning routines
- Calm productivity
- Deep concentration sessions
If this mix helped you focus, consider subscribing for more long-form lofi and synthwave journeys.

## 7. BRAND NOTES

- Avoid heavy neon, rain dominance, or nighttime cues.
- CRT screens should be readable but subtle.
